song.title: Heroes Of The Last Chance
song.info:
5.Heroes Of The Last Chance (7:01)
Day turned to night so long ago, our weariness had begun to show We had to find a place to stop for the night
A village small was waiting near People dreaming dreams full of fear until wiped away by rays of the light...
So pale and sad was the look on their face, living in this grim and forbidding place Disturbing news from the fields not far away
Was rumoured, there a black fire burned Unnatural storms, some did not return after work had ended for the day
We would have to go and investigate, even if it meant riding to our fate...
We're the Heroes of the last chance, riders of the night Against terror and violence, we will forever fight.
With our fists raised high into the air we'll ride to the battlefield So we know this bloody nightmare will end, destroyed by our steel.
